answers.answer: I have 55 days left I'm due Dec 15th but being induced on the 9th  so excited and ready and I feel great except being so tired
Yea i feel great also no pains or anything except a couple of braxton hicks here in there other than that im fine and full of energy
Ugh everything hurts ! I'm so ready for December to get here I have 61 days left ! Other then that my little ladybug is doing great moving so much.
Overall good pains every now and then I'm loving food and sleep OMG I can catch some zzzz's lol only 48 days left ready to get it over w/ :)

Due Dec 19th with a little girl. She will be born before that though.Im getting rather uncomfortable. Can't sleep anymore. I literally get up every hr to pee and half the time i get woke up by tingly arms and hands. My baby girl keeps having dips in her heart rate. Been hospitalized for it once already and have had 2 biophysical profile scans. I now get NST done twice a week and i see the ob every week. My blood pressure is elevated and i have high amounts of protein in my urine. Im hoping i don't develop preeclampsia with this pregnancy too.She weighed 4lb 2oz at my scan done at 30weeks. That's 5oz less than what my son weighed at birth at 35weeks.Ob said if she continues to have dips in her heart rate they will take her early. Im ok with this if it should happen since she would have a better chance outside my womb than inside.
I'm die December 16th,  56 days left. I feel okay, just tired sometimes. My back has been hurting more frequently and just been getting bad bh. Other than that I'm doing good.

I have 40 days left to go until I meet my little baby girl! I am so excited:) and overall feel great, besides a few aches and pains here and there. And she is doing great also measuring right along and healthy. I go for my 35week ultrasound on monday

59 days left until my csection!! I am getting super anxious/excited to meet my little karate master. She's a wild little girl already. I went through alot of stress this weekend, had some pretty serious BH/contractions/off colored discharge..I go to the Dr tomorrow for my check up and make sure everything is ok. I think the baby moved into the head down position cause the kicks are alot harder and higher up, and my belly is slowly getting lower. Has anyone else's tummy dropped yet?

Aww glad your lil ones are doing fine nd @danika hunn everything will be fine just keep the faith and i will be praying for you nd your bundle of joy nd i have to pee alot also i actually peed on myself the other day lmao i was trying to hold it so bad but my lil man just kept kicking my bladdet nd my bladder couldnt take it anymore nd just let loose nd for my mommies with achs nd pains hold on hunns we dont have much longer to meet our lil ones hope yalll start to feel better soon
43 due Dec4 can't wait to meet my princess
Not to sure if my lil man has dropped my i do see that my belly is a lil lower than usual so maybe he did

question: December mommies how are we doing our month is getting really close and with only 49 days left for me to go I can hardly wait i am so ready to meet my lil man how are my other december mommies feeling, how is the lil bundle of joys doing nd how many days do you have left
title: DECEMBER MOMMIES!!!
